content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Remember to also check the Shutterfly website for any specific terms and conditions related to their discounts and promotions. Some offers might have restrictions or limitations, so it's always a good idea to review the fine print.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I hope you find a great deal on your customized mug and that your friend loves the gift!

Happy shopping, and I hope you have a wonderful time celebrating your friend's birthday!
